name: Stunning Barrier, Greater
text: This spell functions as stunning barrier, except as noted above, and it provides a +2 bonus to AC and on saving throws. It is not discharged until it has stunned a number of creatures equal to your caster level.
duration_zh: 1轮/等级 或 直至能量发散
savingThrow_zh: 无 和 意志, 通过则无效; 见文本
spellResistance_zh: 否 和 可; 见文本
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同反震屏障（Stunning Barrier）一般，不过它会为AC何豁免检定提供的加值提升至+2点。而且直至震慑生物的数量等同于你的施法者等级之时，它才会被耗散。
